title: Which champion did you fall in love with FIRST.
body:
The first champion that helped you realise you are not completely worthless at this game and you kind of like it. 



Mine was {{champion:22}} and no, not immediately after the tutorial.

EDIT: Ok so now that we are talking about what champions we loved after..

{{champion:55}} was my fav for years.. I still have a massive crush on her, but now my absolute favourite is {{champion:28}}.

replies.body: When I first saw her, I thought she was the most badass thing I have ever seen

{{champion:267}} 

Was still struggling my way through the early levels with noone to teach me, working it all out on my own. I think I was about lvl 25, but Nami was on the ftp rotation. Played her cause she looked fun, never went back :P She's now my first and highest Mastery 5 and has been my main for more than 2 years :) (with a few stints of maining {{champion:117}} and {{champion:25}} in there).

Second fav champ? Toss up between {{champion:161}} and {{champion:143}}. Soon as Vel'Koz's kit was announced I knew I was gonna play him supp. Never regretted it. Zyra was a more recent pick up but I love her all the same.

But that's champions :3 What about characters? I'd have to say... {{champion:131}} , {{champion:421}} or {{champion:102}}. I love Diana's attitude and her awkward humour, Rek'sai...well I love the xenomorphs (visually anyway :P) and she has a cool backstory, and Shyvana cause she's a half dragon and that's just damn cool.

Now fav lore...that's a real hard one. I'd have to go with Kindred/Aurelion. I love Kindred's mysticism and directness and Aurelion's arrogance and hubris, and their lore really captures that. They also have my fav VOs in the game. Freaking awesome.

But maybe I'm thinking too much about your question :P

Thats fine, I enjoyed reading it all.

Im pretty sold on buying nami right now actually.

Pre level 15, I had an old friend who helped me learn league when it seemed hopeless. It was he told me he had an undying love for Ashe and demanded that I play her at once, and she is now the sole reason Im still playing this game, EDIT: I loved her ability to permaslow and snipe people from across the map, and she was pretty easy to play once you get the basics of league. if not for her, id probably not even play video games all that much.

In terms of characters, ive always had a thing for bloodlust, hence my crush on kat. Jinx was a favourite too, shes adorable.

EDIT: I love Kindred and Diana's VO and I would love them to tell me a bedtime story one day.

I loved Katarinas lore because she was quite the badass, but Lulu's lore is my favourite. Its just so whimsical and unsettling and I love it.

All excellent choices :P The prospect of Kindred telling a bedtime story is amazing tbh, I'd love if Riot did something like that. She'd be perfect for a cinematic play or something like the one in the background of her lore.

_P.S Buy Nami you won't regret it :3_

You mean kindred narrating ?

What if she narrated the next cinematic O.o.
Yeah! I love their dynamic, and Lamb's voice is so pretty :3

omg wait Why akali is getting rework no :(

I think her abilities is best right now no rework plz :/
tbh, akali's burst is really op, probs the best 1v1 champion after lvl 6 other than malzahar (well, malz was designed for 1v1)

true after 6 she is super strong, I think to beat mal the only way is be ahead of him, else he just use combo  n u die for no reason -.- now am nervous about her re-make :/ I am not sure good or bad or what I like her w though, may b they wll change her w or e

In all honesty, I reckon they would tweak all her kit but her W, which they would buff, or at least keep the idea of being invisible.

She should still be able to dash a lot and assassinate, but as much as I love akali, her 3 dashes + resets is pretty op and Riot would probably change her q and e a little bit to make her a unique character, which is what they have really been doing the past couple of reworks.

In saying that, I love akali so much and I am equally as nervous for the changes O.o. They are probably going to make her harder to play, which I'm fine with as long as it still feels like Akali.
I used to main her and kat before the bunch of nerfs and buffs to akali and tbh, she is stronger than before as her e has 1 sec cd and q has lower cd (that means u can fit 2 q's in the space of 1)
I played a few games with her recently, I still think Akali bursts pretty strong but it just feels a bit clunky especially with the e nerf.

{{champion:245}}

When i was first starting out the game i had a friend to show me the ropes, (back when i only knew how to play ashe) i asked him what is the odd joke champion in the game, he respondes its either Yorick or singed, back then i was really poor and couldnt afford yorick so i brought singed and i played the crap out of him (im currently sitting on 80k mastery on him), when i reached level 30 i started to pick up the proxy singed and how cheese it was. this made the game fun for me because i have only seen 2 other good singed players in (my) games on the oce (that was mainly because they were verse a jax and a garen litterly the 2 easist matchups (bronze players stop picking garen into my first pick singed like please dig yourself a grave)) other than that ive played verse 2 other singeds in a singed mirror matchup (and if you thought yasuo mirror matchups were stupid watch 2 fucking singeds, i swear you will fall asleep with the lack of action untill one has the rylias first) both crushed them (mainly because they rushed roa and tear the sandtrap items)
Sooo yea ive always had a soft spot for the mad chemist, he will always be one of my top teir picks just because his play style is different to all the other champions (apart from {{champion:136}} ) and how he has so many build paths (eg. rylias into tornment, or zzrot into rylias, or spectres cowl into banner of command) rather than "RUSH THIS ITEM AND YOUR OP" - Every vayne build on mobafire ever.

Honestly, I wish every champion all had various viable build paths, experimenting with different items is really fun, and I love how you can do that on {{champion:28}} (AP Burst, AD Tank) which contributes to her being my absolute favourite.
Vlad was my first love and is still my top three. I am so glad he has his rework it's amazing so keen for that to go live

A long time ago when I first started playing League support was even less desired of a role than it is today, and at that time {{champion:267}} was there to make my day. As far as AP supports go Nami simply clicked with me, her kit was so versatile and allowed me to contribute in so many ways. 

Soon enough I took a liking to the top lane, and {{champion:102}} and {{champion:131}} were my go to top laners. I just loved being in a fight,  and they fit really well with my fighter play style, they still remain among my favourite champions even though i find it difficult to play them effeciently in the current state of league.
